wikipedia_page.main: Brigadier General John Macready (1887–27 February 1957) was a British army officer who served with the Bedfordshire Regiment in Europe in World War I and in India. His father was Jonathan F. Macready, a son of the celebrated Victorian actor-theatre  manager W.C.Macready.

response: *John Macready (British Army officer) (1887–27 February 1957), British Army brigadier general
